Summary: 3 red-orange orbs moving in straight-line right after midnight new years
trends: There have been 67 other sightings in Louisville
There were 3 other sightings in Louisville on or around January 1st 2012
divs: sighting detailsit was about 12:10 am on new years day, when i went to take my dogs outside. at that moment i was looking up at the stars when i noticed there were 3 orange\red glowing orbs moving from ssw to nne. at first i dismissed it as maybe some chinese laterns or flares but from the distance i was at observing these objects, there were no signs of flames or pulsating lights within. the more i looked at it the more i was comimng to the realization i was seeing something very unusual. my 6 children were home at the time and i immediately called them to come look at what i was seeing. their ages range from 15 to 8. we were all in amazement. these orbs looked as if they could be of great proportion but being i believe pretty far away from them i couldnt get a real idea of how big they were or if they were possible part of an even bigger object. i am a skeptic so this has really been messing with my head. i have been trying to wrap my head around what i possibly saw that night. thank goodness for the internet because i have been searching to see if anyone else had witnessed what we saw that night. when searching i found many reports that matched the description of what i saw and fortunately there were pictures and videos attached to verify it also. when i pulled up the first video i immediately freaked out because it was exactly what i saw and these images were captured in different parts of the country on the same day. i still have no explaination for what my family and i saw. it has really changed my belief on things. i now dont read reports and automatically assume that the person is crazy and is just saying these things for the attention. i do know i wasn't seeing things thankfully because my 6 children witnessed it too and also thanks to mufon i was able to find another report from someone who witnessed the samething her in louisville, ky. the fact that i found this report made me decide to report what i saw in hopes to see if anyone else saw the same thing.
